snippet.title: DSiWare playthrough - Escape Trick: The Secret of Rock City Prison
snippet.description:
Originally released in Japan in 2010 as @ SIMPLE DS Series Vol. 3 THE 密室からの脱出 〜プリズンブレイク〜

I know this isn't my usual content but guys I am SO invested in these crappy lil escape-the-room games you have no idea ;w; and omg this one actually got an ENGLISH release too once!!! As far as I know, the previous two games in the series never got one (unless I'm absurdly wrong...)
Gosh the story in this game is ridiculous now that I can understand what's happening. I can't spoil anything but this one's really bizarre.

Emulator used: melonDS 0.9.2 (if using the latest version, the game hangs when getting the Bad Ending. I had to downgrade.)

TIMESTAMPS:
0:00 Title screen, Introduction cutscene
2:12 STAGE 1
7:30 The Next Day cutscene
11:45 STAGE 2
16:55 STAGE 3
24:18 The Next Day cutscene
27:52 STAGE 4
30:59 Bad Ending
32:03 Rest of Stage 4
32:57 STAGE 5
40:28 Cutscenes
43:39 STAGE 6
54:06 True Ending, Credits
